description:
While searching the streets at night for a bicycle, Hayato happens across a battle between the YFB and R Wings. What started as games quickly changes with a single shot. Shusuke tries to repair his
relationship with Hiyoko, but all his attempts backfire. He gets in an argument with Eriko over Hiyoko`s book, and Hiyoko overhears his conversation...
Takashi and his younger sister Kobato share breakfast. As usual, their interaction is strangely formal...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 小鳩さんは可愛いなあ
